PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-08002009-05-28,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DAVID E. BOND of Westbank, British Columbia, as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Nature to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
